about_the_game:
Havenroot Vale is a first person farming and life game that lets you play as a druid with a close connection to nature. Use your bond with the local flora to grow crops, meet unique creatures, and explore.

Features

  • Cultivate and expand your farm

Start with a humble plot of land to grow crops. Plant and harvest a variety of common and unfamiliar fruits, vegetables, and herbs. Upgrade equipment and use nature magic to enchant your seeds, make them grow faster, and more. As you play, customize your farm by unlocking new areas and building new structures.

  • Attend your local farmers market

Once you think you're ready to start your business, travel to town in the morning to sell your goods at the farmers market! Purchase stalls of varying sizes and styles and set your booth up how you like. Once you open shop, locals will come around and buy what you have to sell if the price is right.

  • Explore and connect with nature

Your ability to connect with the flora of the land will allow you to explore places that have been untouched for centuries. Make your way up winding trees, grow your paths, and discover hidden wonders.

  • Catch and raise unique animals

From sentient mushrooms and tiny frogs to lumbering creatures of the forest! Capture and domesticate animals you find in your bestiary. Build habitats for them or let the larger ones wander around your farm. As long as you provide for their basic needs, they're happy to give you a variety of supplies in return.

  • Craft, cook, and build

Whether it's harvesting your crops or chopping trees, you can take what you have and turn it into something else. Make juice, bread, ingots, or turn your planks into fencing.
